participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and ambitious, Emily is determined to pursue a career in law. She has a deep appreciation for animals, particularly horses, and enjoys engaging with others about her interests.
participant_1.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake has a strong sense of duty and pride in his military service. He enjoys connecting with others through shared interests like animals and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.

content.text: Hey! Are you from a small town? Because I am.
Hello! I am in the army now, but originally yes I am from small town in Canada
those are interesting names for dogs. Can your dogs type?
No she can't and me too, because I didn't graduated from high school
Oh, I see. Do you like horses?
I like horses, do you have any pets?
I have a horse named horse 7.
I like to go to the country and ride in my horses
